entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Welland
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h then southwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:54 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 06:54 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning early in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:54 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 06:54 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
